text:
Sec 3(s)(1) of the Act brings within coverage any employee employed in
an enterprise whose AGV of sales made or business done is not less than
$250,000 (exclusive of excise taxes at the retail level which are separately
stated).
html: Sec 3(s)(1) of the Act brings within coverage any employee employed in an enterprise whose AGV of sales made or business done is not less than $250,000 (exclusive of excise taxes at the retail level which are separately stated).
